item.title: Why There is no Love in The World – Part 2
item.description: In a frank conversation with a Pastor friend, we closely looked at the most important Christian virtue for service and fellowship with one another. This Godly virtue is almost fading away in the believer’s community today. We considered what the reason is and proposed solution to it so that we can rebuild a holistic believers’ community once more.

item.title: Is There Still Believers’ Love Today? Part1
item.description: In a frank conversation with a Pastor friend, we closely looked at the most important Christian virtue for service and fellowship with one another. We considered what the reason is and proposed solution to it so that we can rebuild a holistic believers’ community once more.
